TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewImageCellLayout extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定包含在 中影像的配置。

span.span: Specifies the layout for an image contained in a .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個型別。The following code example illustrates the use of this type. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 使用 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的影像資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout Normal = int32(1)

summary.span: 此圖形會使用其原生 (Native) 解析度，以置中方式顯示。

span.span: The graphic is displayed centered using its native resolution.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout NotSet = int32(0)

span.span: The layout specification has not been set.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout Stretch = int32(2)

summary.span: 此圖形會依必要的百分比自動縮放，以符合包含儲存格的寬度和高度。

span.span: The graphic is stretched by the percentages required to fit the width and height of the containing cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout Zoom = int32(3)

summary.span: 此圖形會均勻地放大，直到填滿包含儲存格的寬度或高度。

span.span: The graphic is uniformly enlarged until it fills the width or height of the containing cell.
